name: Security Release v6.6.5.1
body:
The following security issues have been fixed with this release:

-  Blind SQL-injection in DAL aggregations ([GHSA-p6w9-r443-r752](https://github.com/shopware/shopware/security/advisories/GHSA-p6w9-r443-r752))
-  Server Side Template Injection in Twig using Context functions ([GHSA-35jp-8cgg-p4wj](https://github.com/shopware/shopware/security/advisories/GHSA-35jp-8cgg-p4wj))

-  Improper Access Control with ManyToMany associations in store-api ([GHSA-hhcq-ph6w-494g](https://github.com/shopware/shopware/security/advisories/GHSA-hhcq-ph6w-494g))

name: Release v6.5.8.8
body:
See the [UPGRADE.md](./UPGRADE-6.5.md) for all important technical changes.

The following security issues have been fixed with this release:
*  [NEXT-34608 - Improve account logout (GHSA-5297-wrrp-rcj7)](https://github.com/shopware/shopware/security/advisories/GHSA-5297-wrrp-rcj7)

The following issues have been fixed:
*  [NEXT-32311 - Updated validation in EntityWriter](./changelog/release-6-5-8-8/2024-01-04-updated-validation-in-entitywriter.md)
*  [NEXT-11827 - Clean-up temp files after use of MediaService](./changelog/release-6-5-8-8/2024-01-25-clean-up-temp-files-after-use-of-mediaservice.md)

*  [NEXT-32339 - Do not allow deleting connected media thumbnail size](./changelog/release-6-5-8-8/2024-02-06-do-not-allow-deleting-connected-media-thumbnail-size.md)
*  [NEXT-33571 - Fix creating a new thumbnail size error](./changelog/release-6-5-8-8/2024-02-07-fix-creating-a-new-thumbnail-size-error.md)
*  [NEXT-33748 - Fix sw-media-modal-v2 target-folder property](./changelog/release-6-5-8-8/2024-02-14-fix-sw-media-modal-v2-target-folder-property.md)
